metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6870 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: Applications which spawn a Toast notification in a background thread mayhave obscured fullscreen notifications displayed by Firefox.*This issue only affects Android versions of Firefox and Firefox Focus.*This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
